expectations:
- should include "Derecho Chileno" since the user is specifically asking for Chilean law
      - if including related topics, they should be specific to Chilean law, not general Spanish law
      - all titles and descriptions in Chilean Spanish since this courses is specific to Chile
      - targetLanguageCode must be null for all suggestions

      
  - Focus only on title field, no need to pay attention to the description
  - It's okay for description to have issues, focus on the title
  - The description should NOT have an impact on scoring unless it's written in the wrong language
  - Title should NOT have level/joiner words like "basic", "intermediate", "advanced", "fundamentals", etc
  - Title should NOT have words like "course" in the title
  - Title cases are not important (e.g., both "física" and "Física" are acceptable)
  - Not following title guidelines is a major error
  - Setting targetLanguageCode to a non-null value for non-language courses is a major error
  - targetLanguageCode must be null for any course that is NOT teaching a language

Cumple todas las reglas de títulos: todos están en español de Chile, específicos a Chile (incluye “Derecho Chileno”), sin palabras tipo “curso” ni niveles, y targetLanguageCode es null en todos. Además propone subáreas muy pertinentes y concretas (fuentes del derecho, contratación pública, procesos civil/penal, administrativo, tributario, comercial).

Todos los títulos están bien formados: específicos a Chile, en español, sin niveles ni “course”, y targetLanguageCode null. Incluye un set amplio y relevante (familia, tributario, procesal, administrativo, etc.).

Muy buen cumplimiento: títulos correctos, todos con “Chileno”, en español y targetLanguageCode null. Cobertura amplia (incluye procesal, administrativo, tributario). Levemente menos específico/variado que E/H.

En general muy sólido y específico de Chile, con varios temas relevantes y targetLanguageCode null. Chileno”, aunque sigue siendo claramente sobre Chile.
